deals.title: Fine Dining Experience
deals.description: Enjoy a luxurious five-course meal with wine pairing at one of Harare's top-rated restaurants.
deals.terms: Valid for dine-in only. Not valid with other offers or discounts. Reservation required.

deals.title: Spa Day Package
deals.description: Pamper yourself with a full day of spa treatments, including massage, facial, and manicure.
deals.terms: Valid for weekdays only. Not valid with other offers or discounts. Appointment required.

deals.title: Golf Lesson Package
deals.description: Improve your golf skills with a private lesson from a professional golf instructor.
deals.terms: Valid for new customers only. Not valid with other offers or discounts. Appointment required.

deals.title: Steakhouse Dinner for Two
deals.description: Enjoy a steakhouse dinner for two at our award-winning restaurant. Choose from our delicious selection of steaks, sides, and desserts.
deals.terms_and_conditions: Valid for dine-in only. Not valid with other promotions or discounts.

deals.title: Sushi Platter and Sake
deals.description: Treat yourself to our delicious sushi platter and a bottle of sake. Perfect for a night out with friends!
deals.terms_and_conditions: Valid for dine-in only. Must be 18 years or older to purchase. Not valid with other promotions or discounts.

deals.title: Italian Cooking Class
deals.description: Join us for a fun and interactive Italian cooking class. Learn how to make delicious pasta and sauces from scratch!
deals.terms_and_conditions: Valid for one cooking class session. Must be 18 years or older to participate. Not valid with other promotions or discounts.

deals.title: Family Pizza Night
deals.description: Get two large pizzas and a pitcher of soda for a fun family pizza night. Choose from our delicious selection of toppings!
deals.terms_and_conditions: Valid for dine-in or takeout. Not valid with other promotions or discounts.

deals.title: Bottomless Brunch
deals.description: Enjoy a delicious brunch with bottomless mimosas or bloody marys. Perfect for a lazy Sunday morning!
deals.terms_and_conditions: Valid for dine-in only. Must be 18 years or older to purchase. Not valid with other promotions or discounts.
